remarks: The set of (simple) paths of length 2 (in a graph) is the set of (simple) paths of length 2 between any two different vertices. (Contributed by Alexander van der Vekens, 27-Feb-2018.)
statement:
2wot2wont $p |- ( ( V e. X /\ E e. Y ) -> ( V 2WalksOt E ) = U_ x e. V U_ y e. V ( x ( V 2WalksOnOt E ) y ) ) $.
$d E x y $.
$d V x y $.
